name: tailwind-webapp
description: Tailwind Webapp - A free Tailwind and Vanilla JavaScript webapp template by Creative Tim.

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && cp -a index.html dist && cp -a pages dist && cp -a assets dist
scripts.install:clean: rm -rf node_modules/ && rm -rf package-lock.json && npm install && npm run build:tailwind && npm run build:fontawesome && npm start
scripts.deploy: rm -rf node_modules/ && rm -rf package-lock.json && npm install && npm run build:tailwind && npm run build && gh-pages -d dist
